tool_description: Red (Xiaohongshu) is a Chinese knowledge-sharing and social shopping platform founded in 2013. Here is some important information about Xiaohongshu: User-Generated Content Platform: Xiaohongshu is a user-generated content (UGC) platform that allows users to create, share, and discover various types of content, including articles, images, videos, and more. Users can share their life experiences, knowledge, shopping recommendations, and more on the platform. Social Features: Xiaohongshu emphasi...
name: xiaohongshu data hub
title: xiaohongshu data hub

api_list.name: get note comments sub_comments

required_parameters.name: end_id
required_parameters.description: 第一页为空，翻页页page传上一页的最后一个评论id

required_parameters.name: comment_id
required_parameters.description: 评论id 通过笔记评论列表接口获得

required_parameters.description: general popularity_descending time_descending   综合 最热 最新

optional_parameters.name: note_type
optional_parameters.description: 默认为空    normal 图文筛选 video 视频筛选

get note comment

get user info

optional_parameters.description: 第一页为空，第二页为第一页最后一个笔记的id

api_list.name: get search hot
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://xiaohongshu-data-hub.p.rapidapi.com/xhs/api/app/search/hot"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "xiaohongshu-data-hub.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://xiaohongshu-data-hub.p.rapidapi.com/xhs/api/app/search/hot"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "xiaohongshu-data-hub.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
